To change the lighting time of the backlight,
on the next screen, set the Modify system settings of "Light Time Switcher" to allow. 
After that, a notification settings permission dialog will be displayed. 
If you allow this, the current backlight lighting time will be displayed in the notification area at the top of the screen.
(1) Turn on the switch to the right of \"Allow modifying system settings\".
(2) Click \"←\" at the top left to return.
(2) Click \"←\" at the top left or use the back button to return.
(3) A notification permission dialog will be displayed, so allow it.
